document.discussion_title: The Big 5: These are the stories you should be monitoring today
document.topic_text: These are the top five stories to monitor today Some people are trying to kill Buhari -Mbaka Popular Enugu state Catholic Priest, Ejike Mbaka, has revealed that some people are plotting to kill President Muhammadu Buhari. 2. Mayowa Ahmed dies Despite the #SaveMayowa campaign which successfully raised millions of naira for cancer patient, Mayowa Ahmed, she, however, lost her life. 3. NLC displeased with Imo state’s new policy The Nigerian Labour Congress (NLC) is displeased with the Imo State Government’ s three-day work, two-day farming policy for workers 4. Pastor kills wife, three others Four people were reportedly clubbed to death with a pestle in Sokoto state by a 43-year-old Pastor, Taiwo Adio. 5. Tiwa Savage regrets exposing her private life Nigerian pop singer, Tiwa Savage, has revealed that she made a mistake in spilling out too much about her private life.
